column2: "Okay, now that I have your report, your exploration request can proceed. We look forward to bigger and better things from you."
"At least, that's what the ARKS Code Reporting Section says I should say. Now, I'm going to go off the record here."
"The Tundra is a harsh environment totally unlike the Forest. The native species found there are robust and incredibly dangerous."
"You're bound to get excited about new areas being opened up, but use caution, and don't let yourself get carried away."
"You've worked hard to get this far. I really hope you don't throw it all away by doing something foolish."
